Description: Payments for rent, water, electricity, heating, maintenance fees.
Household items, decor, furniture, cleaning supplies.
Small personal or daily expenses, spontaneous cash spending.
Food and beverages purchased in stores and supermarkets.
Public transit, taxi, fuel, parking, or car maintenance.
Eating out: restaurants, cafes, delivery services.
Movies, games, events, subscriptions, leisure activities.
Mobile plans, internet, subscriptions for connectivity.
Medicines, clinics, dental care, supplements, health insurance.
